markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Plague Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3250)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Plague zombies are infested with horrible contagions.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Plague Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3250)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=782" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 356 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** -2

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Weaknesses**
slashing 10, vitality 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9,
**Damage** 1d8+4 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) and zombie rot

**Zombie Bite** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The zombie has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90); **Effect** The zombie makes a jaws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) melee Strike against that creature with an attack modifier of +9 that deals 1d12+4 piercing damage and exposes the creature to zombie rot.

**Zombie Rot**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510)) An infected creature can't heal damage it takes from zombie rot until it has been cured of the disease; **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 1d6 void damage (1 day); **Stage 3** 1d6 void damage (1 day); **Stage 4** 1d6 void damage (1 day); **Stage 5** dead, rising as a plague zombie immediately

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-487" />
name: Plague Zombie

Zombie Rot (Disease, Divine, Void) An infected creature can't heal damage it takes from zombie rot until it has been cured of the disease; Saving Throw DC 18 Fortitude; Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day); Stage 2 1d6 void damage (1 day); Stage 3 1d6 void damage (1 day); Stage 4 1d6 void damage (1 day); Stage 5 dead, rising as a plague zombie immediately
